name: Village of Fate
description:
Village of Fate was developed for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 by James Leung and Grant Roberts.

In Village of Fate, each day the game deals you a hand of cards and a set of dice. It's up to you to figure out the best way to distribute your dice and keep the village thriving for as long as possible!

For the theme Out of Control, we went for a very RNG-heavy game: fate sets up all the pins and you have to decide how to knock them down.
